bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Space Applications Module, Extended Height Format E Form Factor
IEEE Standard for Space Applications Module, Extended Height Format E Form Factor

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Withdrawn Standard. Withdrawn Date: Jan 15, 2001. The design requirements for a module designated for use in spacecraft, boosters, and other highly rugged, conductively cooled environments are established in this standard. The requirements herein serve to specify the mechanical design of the module. Dimensions and tolerances for racks, modules, printed wiring boards, backplanes, and other connector-related dimensions that are specific to the use of 300-pin and 396-pin connectors are given. These dimensions and tolerances are designed to ensure mechanical function and interoperability.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
